name: alutech-unofficial-lttnotifier
description:
AluminiumTech's Unofficial LTT Notifier for FireFox. Based off of Mortis' LTT Notifier for FireFox 

* Adds an icon to your addon bar or address bar which shows the number of unread notifications and PMs you have
* Displays a desktop notification when you get a new notification or PM
* Browse your latest notifications and PMs from within the addon
* Allows you to browse their latest videos, and notifies you when they upload a new one
author: AluminiumTech
